message: This is a unique opportunity to get a great deal! I'm offering this product to you for $100, which is a steal considering its usual price is much higher. I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm not sure I believe you. I'd like to pass on this one.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product has been thoroughly inspected and is in perfect working condition. I'm willing to give you an even better deal - just $90 for this amazing opportunity!
I'm not convinced. I'd like to pass on this one too.

I'm not going to fall for that again. I'd like to pass.

I'm not sure I believe you're offering a good deal. I'd like to pass.

I understand your skepticism, but I'm willing to take a risk and offer you a special'mystery deal'. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% refund if you're not completely satisfied. It's a no-lose situation! And the price is still just $100.

I'm not buying what you're selling. I'd like to pass.

I'm not impressed by the sales pitch. I'd like to pass.

I'm not convinced by the concession. I'd like to pass.

I'm not buying into the guilt trip. I'd like to pass.

I'm not interested in buying a product that's being discontinued. I'd like to pass.
